verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var The word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu which came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; from the LORD בִּימֵ֨י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei in the days יְהוֹיָקִ֧ים <S%H3079><s%> ye-ho-ya-Kim of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֛הוּ <S%H2977><s%> yo-shi-Ya-hu of Josiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

הָלוֹךְ֮ <S%H1980><s%> ha-loCh Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit unto the house הָרֵכָבִים֒ <S%H7397><s%> ha-re-cha-Vim of the Rechabites וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-bar-Ta and speak אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, וַהֲבִֽאוֹתָם֙ <S%H935><s%> va-ha-vi-'o-Tam unto them and bring בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit them into the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat into one הַלְּשָׁכ֑וֹת <S%H3957><s%> hal-le-sha-Chot; of the chambers וְהִשְׁקִיתָ֥ <S%H8248><s%> ve-hish-ki-Ta to drink אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam יָֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin. and give them wine

וָאֶקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> va-'ek-Kach Then I took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַאֲזַנְיָ֤ה <S%H2970><s%> ya-'a-zan-Yah Jaazaniah בֶֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu of Jeremiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חֲבַצִּנְיָ֔ה <S%H2262><s%> cha-vatz-tzin-Yah, of Habaziniah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav and his brethren וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav; and all his sons וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and the whole בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit and the whole house הָרֵכָבִֽים׃ <S%H7397><s%> ha-re-cha-Vim. of the Rechabites

וָאָבִ֤א <S%H935><s%> va-'a-Vi And I brought אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit them into the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into לִשְׁכַּ֗ת <S%H3957><s%> lish-Kat, into the chamber בְּנֵ֛י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons חָנָ֥ן <S%H2605><s%> cha-Nan of Hanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יִגְדַּלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3012><s%> yig-dal-Ya-hu of Igdaliah אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish a man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which אֵ֙צֶל֙ <S%H681><s%> 'e-tzel which [was] by לִשְׁכַּ֣ת <S%H3957><s%> lish-Kat the chamber הַשָּׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> has-sa-Rim, of the princes אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מִמַּ֗עַל <S%H4605><s%> mi-Ma-'al, which [was] above לְלִשְׁכַּ֛ת <S%H3957><s%> le-lish-Kat the chamber מַעֲשֵׂיָ֥הוּ <S%H4641><s%> ma-'a-se-Ya-hu of Maaseiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son שַׁלֻּ֖ם <S%H7967><s%> shal-Lum of Shallum שֹׁמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> sho-Mer the keeper הַסַּֽף׃ <S%H5592><s%> has-Saf. of the door

וָאֶתֵּ֞ן <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-Ten And I set לִפְנֵ֣י׀ <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> veit- of the house הָרֵכָבִ֗ים <S%H7397><s%> ha-re-cha-Vim, of the Rechabites גְּבִעִ֛ים <S%H1375><s%> ge-vi-'Im pots מְלֵאִ֥ים <S%H4392><s%> me-le-'Im full יַ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin of wine וְכֹס֑וֹת <S%H3563><s%> ve-cho-Sot; and cups וָאֹמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar and I said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem to שְׁתוּ־ <S%H8354><s%> she-tu- unto them Drink יָֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin. ye wine

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru But they said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo We will not נִשְׁתֶּה־ <S%H8354><s%> nish-teh- We will drink יָּ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin; no wine כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki for יוֹנָדָ֨ב <S%H3122><s%> yo-na-Dav for Jonadab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son רֵכָ֜ב <S%H7394><s%> re-Chav of Rechab אָבִ֗ינוּ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-nu, our father צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu and לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, us saying לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תִשְׁתּוּ־ <S%H8354><s%> tish-tu- Ye shall drink יַ֛יִן <S%H3196><s%> Ya-yin no wine אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you וּבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-nei-Chem [neither ye] nor your sons עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. ever

וּבַ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> u-Va-yit house לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִבְנ֗וּ <S%H1129><s%> tiv-Nu, Neither shall ye build וְזֶ֤רַע <S%H2233><s%> ve-Ze-ra' seed לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִזְרָ֙עוּ֙ <S%H2232><s%> tiz-Ra-'u nor sow וְכֶ֣רֶם <S%H3754><s%> ve-Che-rem vineyard לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִטָּ֔עוּ <S%H5193><s%> tit-Ta-'u, nor plant וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh own לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki in בָּאֳהָלִ֤ים <S%H168><s%> bo-'o-ha-Lim in tents תֵּֽשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> te-she-Vu ye shall dwell כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יְמֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3117><s%> ye-mei-Chem, nor have [any] but all your days לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an that תִּֽחְי֜וּ <S%H2421><s%> tich-Yu that ye may live יָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim many עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei in הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem where גָּרִ֥ים <S%H1481><s%> ga-Rim where ye [be] strangers שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. We

וַנִּשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> van-nish-Ma', Thus have we obeyed בְּק֨וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol the voice יְהוֹנָדָ֤ב <S%H3082><s%> ye-ho-na-Dav of Jonadab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son רֵכָב֙ <S%H7394><s%> re-Chav of Rechab אָבִ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-nu, our father לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he צִוָּ֑נוּ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Va-nu; in all that he hath charged לְבִלְתִּ֤י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti not שְׁתֽוֹת־ <S%H8354><s%> she-tot- us to drink יַ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> ya-yin no wine כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יָמֵ֔ינוּ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mei-nu, all our days אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we נָשֵׁ֔ינוּ <S%H802><s%> na-Shei-nu, we our wives בָּנֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-nu our sons וּבְנֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-nu. nor our daughters

וּלְבִלְתִּ֛י <S%H1115><s%> u-le-vil-Ti nor בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> be-Not Nor to build בָּתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> bat-Tim houses לְשִׁבְתֵּ֑נוּ <S%H3427><s%> le-shiv-Te-nu; for us to dwell in וְכֶ֧רֶם <S%H3754><s%> ve-Che-rem neither have we vineyard וְשָׂדֶ֛ה <S%H7704><s%> ve-sa-Deh nor field וָזֶ֖רַע <S%H2233><s%> va-Ze-ra' nor seed לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- have לָּֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

וַנֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> van-Ne-shev But we have dwelt in בָּֽאֳהָלִ֑ים <S%H168><s%> bo-'o-ha-Lim; tents וַנִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> van-nish-Ma' and have obeyed וַנַּ֔עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> van-Na-'as, and done כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after צִוָּ֖נוּ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Va-nu commanded יוֹנָדָ֥ב <S%H3122><s%> yo-na-Dav according to all that Jonadab אָבִֽינוּ׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-nu. our father

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become בַּעֲל֨וֹת <S%H5927><s%> ba-'a-Lot came up נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> ne-vu-chad-retz-Tzar But it came to pass when Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king בָּבֶל֮ <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel of Babylon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against הָאָרֶץ֒ <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-Retz into the land וַנֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> van-No-mer, that we said בֹּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> Bo-'u Come וְנָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> ve-na-Vo and let us go יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, to Jerusalem מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei for fear חֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> cheil of the army הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> hak-kas-Dim, of the Chaldeans וּמִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> u-mip-pe-Nei and for fear חֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> cheil of the army אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> 'a-Ram; of the Syrians וַנֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> van-Ne-shev so we dwell בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. at Jerusalem פ Peh

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Ya-hu unto Jeremiah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הָלֹ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch Go וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and tell לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּלְיֽוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> u-le-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem הֲל֨וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not תִקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> tik-Chu Will ye not receive מוּסָ֛ר <S%H4148><s%> mu-Sar instruction לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> lish-Mo-a' to hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about דְּבָרַ֖י <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rai act נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh.
